column2: My heat pump keeps my house warm.
column3: My heat pump is expensive to run.
column4: I received a good handover from the installer.
column5: I understand how to operate my heat pump.
column6: My heat pump is cheaper to run than my previous heating system. (By cheaper we refer to cost per unit of electricity used, despite the electricity price fluctuations).
column7: My heat pump is reliable. (i.e. it doesn’t break down.)
column8: I know what data is collected from my home through the heat pump.
